content:
sam ChaneyJanuary  

So Long Longboard
A UNF student contacted officials on Jan PERIOD  to report a stolen skateboard that was valued at  PERIOD
According to the police report the student entered the Osprey Commons Cafeteria in Bldg PERIOD  around  p.m PERIOD and placed his skateboard on the nearby skateboard rack PERIOD The skateboard itself was reportedly not locked or secured PERIOD
The student said that he exited the building at approximately  p.m PERIOD and found that his skateboard was no longer on the rack PERIOD According to the report the student then attended a school sponsored meeting in the Student Union before notifying officials of the missing skateboard PERIOD
The report states that no witnesses were located due to the students delay in contacting UNFPD PERIOD
The skateboard was a longboard with blue wheels approximately  long and made of wood PERIOD The top of the skateboard had black decktape with a small mountain logo and the bottom was painted gray with a YinYang symbol PERIOD
Patrol efforts have been suspended due to a lack of evidence or suspects PERIOD

Get In The Car
UNFPD was dispatched to the Osprey Cove on Jan PERIOD  in response to suspicious activity in Lot  PERIOD
The police report states that a female UNF student was walking back to her dorm through Lot  when a vehicle approached her at a high speed PERIOD A male with a strong Indian accent reportedly asked her to enter the vehicle and go with them PERIOD The student says that she walked away and responded Im not getting in the car with you. the vehicle then reportedly sped away in the direction of Lot  and ECO Drive PERIOD
According to the report the suspects were described as three males of Indian descent with short hair possibly driving a silver Mustang with a hardtop PERIOD The student stated that it was the man in the front passenger seat who asked her to enter the vehicle and that the encounter was too brief to ascertain very much information PERIOD
The report states that officials searched the area and found nothing PERIOD
Due to the suspect calling late police cannot do anything further PERIOD
